SEARCH
Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.core

Class MonitorHttp

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.core.SuperHttp
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.core.MonitorHttp
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MonitorHttpCLI, MonitorHttpGUI
public abstract class MonitorHttp extends SuperHttp
Class: MonitorHttp is responsible for the http requests that are made to the docker daemon in order to get information about a container, get statistics about a running container or search for an image. It extends the SuperHttp class.
See Also:
  • SuperHttp

  • Method Details

    • inspectContainer

      public abstract void inspectContainer()
      Abstract method to inspect details of a container. Implementation should provide the specific logic for inspecting container information.

    • getContainerStats

      public abstract org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getContainerStats(String MIGHT_GOT_TO_REMOVE_PARAMETER)
      Abstract method to retrieve statistics for a container.
      Parameters:
      MIGHT_GOT_TO_REMOVE_PARAMETER - The ID of the container for which statistics are requested.
      Returns:
      CloseableHttpResponse containing container statistics. Implementation should handle the specific logic for obtaining container stats.

    • searchImage

      public abstract void searchImage()
      Abstract method to search for Docker images. Implementation should provide the specific logic for searching images.

    • getHttpResponse

      public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getHttpResponse()
      Method: getHttpResponse(String) executes the http request for getting stats about a running container. throws Exception if an error occurs while executing the http request.
      Overrides:
      getHttpResponse in class SuperHttp
      Returns:
      response

    • getFormattedStats

      public double getFormattedStats(StringBuffer response1Buffer) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Method: getFormattedStats(StringBuffer) formats the json response for stats to a user-friendly message. that is real-time updated and printed to the console
      Parameters:
      response1Buffer - a StringBuffer object.
      Returns:
      cpu usage
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if an error occurs while executing the http request. The code below should work too. Instead, it return 0.0. We have to check it further double cpu_delta = jsonNode.get("cpu_stats").get("cpu_usage").get("total_usage").asDouble() - jsonNode.get("precpu_stats").get("cpu_usage").get("total_usage").asDouble(); double system_delta = jsonNode.get("cpu_stats").get("system_cpu_usage").asDouble() - jsonNode.get("precpu_stats").get("system_cpu_usage").asDouble(); double number_cpus = jsonNode.get("cpu_stats").get("online_cpus").asDouble(); return (system_delta!=0.0)? (cpu_delta / system_delta) * number_cpus * 100.0 : 0.0;

    • getTableforContainer

      public String[] getTableforContainer() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Method: getTableforContainer() retrieves information about a container and formats it into an array for table representation.
      Returns:
      An array containing container information: [0] Container ID [1] Container Name [2] Container Status [3] Image ID [4] Network ID [5] Gateway [6] IP Address [7] Mac Address
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error processing the JSON response.

    • prepareStoragedData

      public String[] prepareStoragedData()
      Method: prepareStorageData() returns a String array with the prepared data that will be saved in a csv file.
      Returns:
      str a String array with the data that will be saved in a csv file.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if an error occurs while executing the http request.
